features.name: Badge Management
features.description: Create, edit, delete and manage gamification badges with different tiers (Bronze, Silver, Gold) and associated scoring actions.
test_scenarios: Create new badge with Bronze tier
Create new badge with Silver tier
Create new badge with Gold tier
Edit existing badge name and description
Verify badge cannot be created without actions
Verify duplicate badge names are handled
Test badge with multiple scoring actions

features.name: Badge Creation Wizard
features.description: Three-step wizard interface for creating badges with badge details, scoring action selection, and goal setting.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Gamification > Badges > Create Badge
test_scenarios: Navigate through all three wizard steps
Go back to previous steps in wizard
Complete badge creation with all required fields
Verify step 2: action selection and configuration
Verify step 3: goal setting and timeframe
Test wizard with missing required fields
Verify wizard state is maintained when navigating between steps

features.name: Badge Image Management
features.description: Upload, select and manage badge images for visual representation of achievements.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Gamification > Badges > Create/Edit Badge
test_scenarios: Select existing badge image from gallery
Verify uploaded images appear in image selector
Test image upload with special characters in filename

features.name: Scoring Actions Configuration
features.description: Configure experience and reputation points for various user actions with limits and intervals.
test_scenarios: Edit experience points for an action
Edit reputation points for an action
Set maximum count for an action

features.name: Privilege Management
features.description: Define and manage user privileges based on reputation points earned through gamification.
test_scenarios: Verify privilege with zero reputation points
Test privilege with maximum reputation points

features.name: Search and Filter Functionality
features.description: Search and filter capabilities across badges, scoring actions, and privileges with text search and module filtering.
test_scenarios: Search scoring actions by activity name
Filter scoring actions by desktop module

features.name: Pagination and Sorting
features.description: Navigate through large datasets with pagination and sort data by different columns.
test_scenarios: Verify sort order persists during pagination

features.name: Desktop Module Integration
features.description: Integration with DNN desktop modules to track and reward actions across different modules.
test_scenarios: Test with module that has no scoring actions
Verify module filtering across all tabs

features.name: Badge Details View
features.description: View detailed information about badges including associated actions, tier, and timeframe.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Gamification > Badges > View Badge
test_scenarios: Test badge details for each tier

features.name: Inline Editing
features.description: Edit scoring actions and privileges directly in the data grid without opening separate forms.
test_scenarios: Verify UI updates after inline edit

features.name: Permission and License Validation
features.description: Verify proper permissions and license checks for accessing gamification features.
test_scenarios: Verify license check for Evoq features
Test menu visibility based on permissions

features.name: Validation and Error Handling
features.description: Input validation and error handling across all gamification features.
test_scenarios: Validate badge must have at least one action
Test boundary values for numeric inputs

features.name: Localization Support
features.description: Support for multiple languages through resource files.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Gamification > All UI Elements
test_scenarios: Verify all UI text uses resource strings

features.name: Badge Tier Management
features.description: Manage different badge tiers (Bronze, Silver, Gold) with appropriate visual indicators.
test_scenarios: Verify tier displays in badge list

features.name: Scoring Action Intervals
features.description: Configure time-based limitations for scoring actions (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly).
test_scenarios: Set daily interval with max count
Set weekly interval with max count
Set monthly interval with max count
Set yearly interval with max count
